00038 Equation::~Equation()
00039 {
00040     /* Decrement the counter. */
00041     (*count_ref)--;

00049 Equation &Equation::operator=(const Equation &other)
00050 {
00051     if(this != &other)
00052     {
00053         destroy();
00054         copy(other);
00055     }
00056     return *this;

00062 void Equation::copy(const Equation &other)
00063 {
00064     eq_id        = other.get_id();
00065     l_value      = *other.get_l_value();
00066     r_value      = other.get_r_value();
00067     count_ref    = other._get_count_ref();
00068 
00069     /* Increment the counter. */
00070     (*count_ref)++;
00071 }
00072 
00076 void Equation::destroy()
00077 {
00078     /* Check if is the last reference. */
00079     if(*count_ref == 0)
00080     {
00081         /* Free all memory of the equation. */
00082         delete(count_ref);
00083 
00084         delete(r_value);
00085     }
00086 }

00147 void Equation::inorder_only_leaf(const Expression* head, vector<const Expr_leaf*> &result) const
00148 {
00149     const Expr_node* root(dynamic_cast<const Expr_node*>(head));
00150 
00151     if(root)
00152     {
00153         for(size_t i(0); i < root->get_childs().size(); i++)
00154         {
00155             Expr_node *child(dynamic_cast<Expr_node*>(root->get_child(i)));
00156 
00157             if (child)
00158             {
00159                 inorder_only_leaf(child,result);
00160             }
00161             else
00162             {
00163                 Expr_leaf *child_leaf((Expr_leaf*)root->get_child(i));
00164                 result.push_back(child_leaf);
00165             }
00166         }
00167     }
00168     else
00169     {
00170         Expr_leaf *root_leaf((Expr_leaf*)head);
00171         result.push_back(root_leaf);
00172     }
00173 }
00174 
00178 void Equation::inorder_only_instance(const Expression *head, vector<const Expr_instance*> &result) const
00179 {
00180     const Expr_node *root(dynamic_cast<const Expr_node*>(head));
00181 
00182     if(root)
00183     {
00184         for(size_t i(0); i < root->get_childs().size(); i++)
00185         {
00186             Expr_node *child(dynamic_cast<Expr_node*>(root->get_child(i)));
00187 
00188             if (child)
00189             {
00190                 inorder_only_instance(child, result);
00191             }
00192             else
00193             {
00194                 Expr_instance *child_instace(dynamic_cast<Expr_instance*>(root->get_child(i)));
00195                 if (child_instace)
00196                 {
00197                     result.push_back(child_instace);
00198                 }
00199             }
00200         }
00201     }
00202     else
00203     {
00204         Expr_instance *child_instace(dynamic_cast<Expr_instance*>((Expr_leaf*)head));
00205         if (child_instace)
00206         {
00207             result.push_back(child_instace);
00208         }
00209     }
00210 }

00215 const vector<const Expr_instance*> Equation::get_instance_right_side() const
00216 {
00217         vector<const Expr_instance*> result;
00218         inorder_only_instance(r_value, result);
00219         return result;
00220 }

00229 const string Equation::to_string() const
00230 {
00231     string eq("/*");
00232     stringstream id_eq;
00233     id_eq << eq_id;
00234     eq.append(id_eq.str());
00235     eq.append("*/ ");
00236 
00237     eq.append(l_value.to_string());
00238     eq.append(" = ");
00239     eq.append(r_value->to_string());
00240     eq.append(";");
00241     return eq;
00242 }

00247 const bool Equation::equals(const Equation &other) const
00248 {
00249     return key().compare(other.key()) == 0;

00259 const string Equation::key() const
00260 {
00261     string key(l_value.to_string());
00262     key.append(r_value->to_string());
00263     return key;
